actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System.

summary.text: Oregon Omnibus Wilderness Act - Designates, under the provisions of the Wilderness Act, the following lands as wilderness: (1) specified lands within the Umpaqua National Forest, Oregon; (2) specified lands within the Mount Hood National Forest, Oregon; (3) specified lands within the Siuslaw National Forest, Oregon; (4) specified lands within the Umatilla National Forest, Oregon; and (5) other specified lands within such State. Provides for the administration of such areas by the Secretary of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System.
